title: Diamondback Release 5C upgrades its spec, still rockin’ 27.5″ wheels for now
content:
Diamondback has been very slow to add 29er wheels to their carbon bikes, with the upcoming Yowie short-travel trail bike being the first to mix carbon with big wheels. Which means, for now, the best carbon fiber mountain bike you can get from the brand is their Release 5C, a 130mm travel Level Link trail

The post Diamondback Release 5C upgrades its spec, still rockin’ 27.5″ wheels for now appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
